Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, buccal swab, or saliva
Purpose: To analyze patient DNA for pathogenic variants associated with hereditary thyroid cancer, providing accurate and reliable genetic results.
Container: EDTA tube for blood, buccal swab, or saliva DNA-stabilizing collection kit
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, next-generation sequencing (NGS) platform, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus
